alert.note: Alert for Taiya Inlet and Klondike Highway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 21 at 2:42PM AKST until January 22 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 12 inches. Highest near White Pass. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Klondike Highway above 1000 feet. * WHEN...From 3 AM Friday to 9 AM AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Consistent snowfall rates expected of an inch every 3 hours, with lighter snowfall rates remaining after the advisory ends. A rise in temperatures and snow levels are expected Saturday afternoon resulting in rain mixing in with snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
